title.rendered: TUDIA Merge, Dual Layer Case Designed for Nuu Mobile G3, G3+ Android Smartphone (Rose Gold)

content.rendered:
Colour Name:Rose Gold

The TUDIA Ultra Slim MERGE for Nuu Mobile G3 is a premium twin layer cowl that gives optimum safety from the scratches and scuffs of every day use with out including bulk and distorting the smooth design of your telephone mannequin. This long-lasting, sturdy case is made with a mix of high grade Thermoplastic Polyurethane (TPU) and polycarbonate supplies. With openings for all buttons and connectors, the TUDIA Ultra Slim MERGE preserves the angles and unique design of the Nuu Mobile G3 and nonetheless permits the machine to be absolutely practical when geared up with this cowl. The TUDIA Ultra Slim MERGE gives superior safety using a shock absorbing TPU and a scratch resistant exterior defend, maintaining your Nuu Mobile G3 wanting nearly as good as new.

Make positive this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
[MILITARY GRADE CERTIFIED PROTECTION]: TUDIA’s MERGE Series circumstances are licensed (MIL-STD-810G) and drop examined for shockproof safety
[HEAVY DUTY PROTECTION] Dual layer anti shock smooth interior TPU and exterior polycarbonate protects telephone from drops and scratches.
[SCREEN AND CAMERA PROTECTION] Raised edge protects your telephone’s display and digicam from scratches when positioned face down
[RUGGED DESIGN] Slim, rugged type case with comfy grip is available in 4 totally different colours.
[CLICKY BUTTONS] Precise cutouts provide buttons to be simply pressed
